name: Quick and Easy Tuna Pasta Bake
author: Sarah-Jean
summary: This is a super quick and easy recipe I made for my seven young children out of whatever I could find in my cupboard one evening! I'd say normally it'd serve 4 adults or up to 6 children. It's on the table in less than 30 minutes.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch dried Italian herbs, or to taste
1 teaspoon dry bread crumbs, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes
Drain and return penne to the pot
Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler
Mix tuna, spaghetti sauce, salt, pepper, and Italian herbs into the drained penne
Pour penne mixture into an oven-proof dish
Sprinkle with Cheddar cheese and bread crumbs
Broil in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and breadcrumbs are crispy, about 5 minutes
